mean_cn: n. 界面，【地质】分界面，接触面
mean_en: a system that is used for operating a computer :a system that controls the way information is shown to a computer user and the way the user is able to work with the computer
word_etyma: inter在…之间，相互+face脸，面→ 界面；分界面，接触面
sentence: The most important part of a tablet computer is its user interface.
sentence_trans: 平板电脑最重要的部分就是它的用户界面。
